name: timespan.xt
description: Nuget package for fluent timespan usage.

scripts.build:prod: dotnet clean && dotnet build -tl && dotnet publish src/TimeSpan.Xt.csproj -c Release -f net9.0
scripts.pre-push: npm run tool:restore && npm run build:prod && npm run test:unit && npm run test:quality
scripts.test:quality: dotnet tool run roslynator analyze -o ./roslynator.yml --severity-level hidden
scripts.test:unit: dotnet test TimeSpan.Xt.sln --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" --logger:"junit;LogFilePath=../junit/junit-test-result.xml" && dotnet tool run reportgenerator -reports:"**/*/coverage.cobertura.xml" -targetdir:"coverage" -reporttypes:"Cobertura;HtmlInline"
